queryList.query: sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_guest_seconds_total{instance=~'.*'}[1m])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance=~'.*'}[1m])))&duration=1h&step=5m
queryList.name: CPU spent seconds in guests (VMs) - Guest   Time spent running a virtual CPU for a guest operating system query

queryList.query: sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_guest_seconds_total{instance=~'.*'}[1m])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance=~'.*'}[1m])))&duration=1h&step=5m
queryList.name: CPU spent seconds in guests (VMs) - GuestNice   Time spent running a niced guest   virtual CPU for guest operating system query
Memory Active / Inactive - Inactive   Memory which has been less recently used   It is more eligible to be reclaimed for other purposes query
Memory Active / Inactive - Active   Memory that has been used more recently and usually not reclaimed unless absolutely necessary query
Memory Committed - Committed AS   Amount of memory presently allocated on the system query
Memory Committed - CommitLimit   Amount of  memory currently available to be allocated on the system query
Memory Active / Inactive Detail - Inactive file   File backed memory on inactive LRU list query
Memory Active / Inactive Detail - Inactive anon   Anonymous and swap cache on inactive LRU list  including tmpfs  shmem query
Memory Active / Inactive Detail - Active file   File backed memory on active LRU list query
Memory Active / Inactive Detail - Active anon   Anonymous and swap cache on active least recently used  LRU  list  including tmpfs query
Memory Writeback and Dirty - Writeback   Memory which is actively being written back to disk query
Memory Writeback and Dirty - WritebackTmp   Memory used by FUSE for temporary writeback buffers query
Memory Writeback and Dirty - Dirty   Memory which is waiting to get written back to the disk query
Memory Shared and Mapped - Mapped   Used memory in mapped pages files which have been mapped  such as libraries query
Memory Shared and Mapped - Shmem   Used shared memory  shared between several processes  thus including RAM disks query
Memory Shared and Mapped - ShmemHugePages   Memory used by shared memory  shmem  and tmpfs allocated  with huge pages query
Memory Shared and Mapped - ShmemPmdMapped   Amount of shared  shmem tmpfs  memory backed by huge pages query
Memory Slab - SUnreclaim   Part of Slab  that cannot be reclaimed on memory pressure query
Memory Slab - SReclaimable   Part of Slab  that might be reclaimed  such as caches query
Memory Vmalloc - VmallocChunk   Largest contiguous block of vmalloc area which is free query
Memory Vmalloc - VmallocTotal   Total size of vmalloc memory area query
Memory Vmalloc - VmallocUsed   Amount of vmalloc area which is used query
Memory Bounce - Bounce   Memory used for block device bounce buffers query
Memory Anonymous - AnonHugePages   Memory in anonymous huge pages query
Memory Anonymous - AnonPages   Memory in user pages not backed by files query
Memory Kernel / CPU - KernelStack   Kernel memory stack  This is not reclaimable query
Memory Kernel / CPU - PerCPU   Per CPU memory allocated dynamically by loadable modules query
Memory HugePages Counter - HugePages Free   Huge pages in the pool that are not yet allocated query
Memory HugePages Counter - HugePages Rsvd   Huge pages for which a commitment to allocate from the pool has been made  but no allocation has yet been made query
Memory HugePages Counter - HugePages Surp   Huge pages in the pool above the value in  proc sys vm nr hugepages query
Memory HugePages Size - HugePages   Total size of the pool of huge pages query
Memory HugePages Size - Hugepagesize   Huge Page size query
Memory DirectMap - DirectMap1G   Amount of pages mapped as this size query
Memory DirectMap - DirectMap2M   Amount of pages mapped as this size query
Memory DirectMap - DirectMap4K   Amount of pages mapped as this size query
Memory Unevictable and MLocked - Unevictable   Amount of unevictable memory that can t be swapped out for a variety of reasons query
Memory Unevictable and MLocked - MLocked   Size of pages locked to memory using the mlock   system call query
Memory NFS - NFS Unstable   Memory in NFS pages sent to the server  but not yet committed to the storage query
Memory Pages In / Out - Pagesin   Page in operations query
Memory Pages In / Out - Pagesout   Page out operations query
Memory Pages Swap In / Out - Pswpin   Pages swapped in query
Memory Pages Swap In / Out - Pswpout   Pages swapped out query
Memory Page Faults - Pgfault   Page major and minor fault operations query
Memory Page Faults - Pgmajfault   Major page fault operations query
Memory Page Faults - Pgminfault   Minor page fault operations query

Netstat IP In / Out Octets - InOctets   Received octets query
Netstat IP In / Out Octets - OutOctets   Sent octets query
Netstat IP Forwarding - Forwarding   IP forwarding query
ICMP In / Out - InMsgs    Messages which the entity received  Note that this counter includes all those counted by icmpInErrors query
ICMP In / Out - OutMsgs   Messages which this entity attempted to send  Note that this counter includes all those counted by icmpOutErrors query
ICMP Errors - InErrors   Messages which the entity received but determined as having ICMP specific errors  bad ICMP checksums  bad length  etc query
UDP In / Out - InDatagrams   Datagrams received query
UDP In / Out - OutDatagrams   Datagrams sent query
UDP Errors - InErrors   UDP Datagrams that could not be delivered to an application query
UDP Errors - NoPorts   UDP Datagrams received on a port with no listener query
UDP Errors - InErrors Lite   UDPLite Datagrams that could not be delivered to an application query
UDP Errors - RcvbufErrors   UDP buffer errors received query
UDP Errors - SndbufErrors   UDP buffer errors send query
TCP In / Out - InSegs   Segments received  including those received in error  This count includes segments received on currently established connections query
TCP In / Out - OutSegs   Segments sent  including those on current connections but excluding those containing only retransmitted octets query
TCP Errors - ListenOverflows   Times the listen queue of a socket overflowed query
TCP Errors - ListenDrops   SYNs to LISTEN sockets ignored query
TCP Errors - TCPSynRetrans   SYN SYN ACK retransmits to break down retransmissions in SYN  fast timeout retransmits query
TCP Errors - RetransSegs   Segments retransmitted   that is  the number of TCP segments transmitted containing one or more previously transmitted octets query
TCP Errors - InErrs   Segments received in error  e g   bad TCP checksums query
TCP Errors - OutRsts   Segments sent with RST flag query
TCP Errors - TCPRcvQDrop   Packets meant to be queued in rcv queue but dropped because socket rcvbuf limit hit query
TCP Errors - TCPOFOQueue   TCP layer receives an out of order packet and has enough memory to queue it query
TCP Connections - CurrEstab   TCP connections for which the current state is either ESTABLISHED or CLOSE  WAIT query
TCP Connections - MaxConn   Limit on the total number of TCP connections the entity can support  Dynamic is   1 query
TCP SynCookie - SyncookiesFailed   Invalid SYN cookies received query
TCP SynCookie - SyncookiesRecv   SYN cookies received query
TCP SynCookie - SyncookiesSent   SYN cookies sent query
TCP Direct Transition - ActiveOpens   TCP connections that have made a direct transition to the SYN SENT state from the CLOSED state query
TCP Direct Transition - PassiveOpens   TCP connections that have made a direct transition to the SYN RCVD state from the LISTEN state query
TCP Stat - established   TCP sockets in established state query
TCP Stat - fin wait2   TCP sockets in fin wait2 state query
TCP Stat - listen   TCP sockets in listen state query
TCP Stat - time wait   TCP sockets in time wait state query
